data.title: Adding GPS to a Wifi only iPad
data.meta_description: This is a common issue that comes up, so for the interest of others I thought I'd once again provide the answer.   PROBLEM: WiFionly iPad models (ones without cellular network capability) do NOT have an inbuilt GPS receiver,...
